sentence: On the very next play, Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford, in shotgun formation, is surveying Tampa Bay’s coverage when center Brian Allen unexpectedly snaps the ball.
title: ‘This is officially lunacy’: The eight crazy plays that capped the Rams’ win

sentence: Kupp, who had nine catches for 183 yards, lost a fumble, and the offense failed to take advantage of Miller sacking Brady to a force a fumble at the Tampa Bay 25 when center Brian Allen snap sailed past Stafford in shotgun formation and recovered by the Bucs.
author: Fred Goodall
title: Last-second FG lifts Rams over Brady, Buccaneers

sentence: There are several appealing center options in free agency, including Ryan Jensen of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, Ben Jones of the Tennessee Titans and Brian Allen of the Los Angeles Rams.
author: Alex Ballentine
title: NFL Starters Who Could Have Their Jobs Stolen by Free-Agent Signings in 2022

sentence: Both have free agents of their own to worry about, whether it's edge-rusher Von Miller and center Brian Allen in Los Angeles or linebacker De'Vondre Campbell and cornerback Rasul Douglas in Green Bay.
author: Gary Davenport
title: Tom Brady Is Back, but the Buccaneers Are Far from Super Bowl Favorites

sentence: With Brian Allen, Joe Noteboom and Coleman Shelton resigning with the champs, it’s the latter who is projected to slide into Corbett’s vacated spot.
author: Lorenzo Reyna
title: Rams Losing $2.6 Million Lineman & Another Trench Standout: Report

sentence: “Coming off of an Achilles’, six months, and doing what he can to help our football team win, just having him back was awesome,” Rams center Brian Allen said Thursday.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Super wasn’t good enough for Rams’ Cam Akers
